page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT, ENERGY, CLUBS
page.content: {EMPLOYMENT}Leverton people work at West Burton, Cottam and Marnham Power Stations, Rampton Hospital,local farms and towns. Approx 5% work overseas. {ENERGY }North Leverton is in the middle of the Trent Valley power stations. Coal is underground but yet unmined, oil is extracted from wells within 5 miles. Electricity is used for heat, light and power. 30% of houses use solid fuel for heating, 15% use bottled gas and 33% night storage heaters. {CLUBS}North Leverton Cricket club has played on the cricket field for many years, Youth clubs are now held in the school. Club for senior Citizens meet at South Leverton Institute. Clubs are attached to the Power Stations and Rampton Hospital.
